short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can easily have your discount calculated and displayed alongside the original price on the Argos website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have your discount calculated and displayed alongside the original price on all products. You can easily set a new discount by dragging the slider up and down to your required value from 5% to 50%
